Detailed Description

CiStuffMobileContainer class is the default UI container for "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This class is the default UI which is displayed when the application is launched.

Member Function Documentation

CCoeControl* CiStuffMobileContainer::ComponentControl (  TInt  aIndex  )  const [private]
 

Returns the pointer to a component inside the container.

This method returns a to pointer to the component inside the container.

Parameters:
aIndex as an TInt. Represents the index of the components. Indexs start from 0 with component constructed first to have a lower index than the one constructed later.
Returns:
pointer to the component.

void CiStuffMobileContainer::ConstructL (  const TRect &  aRect  ) 
 

Second level constructor for CiStuffMobileContainer class.

This method initiates the GUI by loading the image that has to be displayed into the background of the container. It also contructs a label and puts it into the contanier.

Parameters:
aRect as TRect object. Represents the area to which container should be drawn.

Returns the number of component in the container.

This method returns the number of component in the container.

Returns:
an integer indicating number of components.

void CiStuffMobileContainer::Draw (  const TRect &  aRect  )  const [private]
 

Draws the GUI.

This methos Draws the container on the screen with the background image.

Parameters:
aRect as TRect class type. Represents the area to be used for drawing the container.

void CiStuffMobileContainer::SendToBackground (   ) 
 

Sends the GUI to the background.

Whenver this method is called it send the application UI to the background in the mobile phone. The application is active even when in background.

void CiStuffMobileContainer::SizeChanged (   )  [private]
 

Resizes the components inside the container.

This method is called when the size of the container changes. It adjusts the size of the components inside the container.
